content.text: Nice to meet you Alex, I'm Michael. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch Game of Thrones, even though my parents don't approve of it.
That's interesting, what do you like about it?
I love the story and the characters. It's a really well-made show.
I've never seen it, but I've heard good things about it.
You should check it out! It's really good.
Maybe I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to museums with my friends and see all the amazing exhibits. I also love to ride my bike.
That sounds like fun. I've never been to a museum, but I've always wanted to go.
You should! They're really cool. And there's something for everyone.
You should! And if you ever want someone to go with you, I'd be happy to.
No problem. It's always more fun to go to things with someone else.
